Former TOWIE star Lucy Mecklenburgh looks tanned and gorgeous in a floral bandeau bikini while enjoying her 'baby moon'.

The fitness guru, 28, is on holiday with her best pal Lydia Bright, who is also pregnant.

Lucy posed for a mirror selfie with her hand over her bump in her hotel bathroom.

(Image: Instagram)

She is expecting a boy with fiance Ryan Thomas , while Lydia, 29, is expecting a girl with her ex boyfriend Lee Cronin.

Lucy and Lydia's babies are due around February time just five days apart from each other.

Also joining them on their trip are Love Island star Montana Brown and presenter Ashley James.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: @lucymeck1/Instagram)

They are staying at the Grecotel Corfu Imperial resort, which is described as "exclusive" on the website.

The girls went to a wine tasting session, and luckily for Lucy and Lydia they didn't have to miss out. Instead they had non-alcoholic wine.

Lucy recently captured the moment Lydia felt her baby kick for the first time.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The two were they laid in bed together before Lucy turned the camera to Lydia who started crying with joy.

Lucy said: So Lyd hasn't felt a kick yet, I have, and she got a little bit jealous and worried.

"And she just felt her first kick and she's all upset. Aww Lyd - it's so lovely isn't it?"

Lydia covered her mouth and was too emotional for words.
description: The two former TOWIE stars are enjoying a 'baby moon' together in Greece
